name: Three Kingdoms Zhao Yun
description:
- Dive into 12 complete story chapters
- Choose from 3 difficulty levels, with a minimum of 30 hours experience of main storyline.
- Master 4 distinct weapon systems: spears, bows and arrows, swords, and steeds, supplemented by equipment systems like crafting, sets, refinement, and enchantment.
- Explore no fewer than 30 expansive maps.
- Encounter dozens of well-known Chinese historical figures, who will either fight by your side or become your adversaries.
- Enjoy a wide range of visually striking outfits for the protagonist and companions.
- Engage in several large-scale, renowned battles that truly capture the essence of the Three Kingdoms atmosphere.
